typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		Article as string,
		{Type doc. vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as string,
		{Année civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qté cdée} as string,
		{CA cdé} as string,
		{Qté livrée} as string,
		{CA livré} as string,
		{Qté facturée} as string,
		{CA facturé} as string,
		{Cout standard cdé} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livré} as string,
		{Cout standard facturé} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source2
source1 derive(date_id = replace({Jour calendaire},'-',''),
		year = split({Jour calendaire}, "-")[1],
		yearmonth = split({Jour calendaire}, "-")[1] + split({Jour calendaire},"-")[2]) ~> extractionYearMonth
extractionYearMonth filter(!({Type de facture} =='YFAR' && ({Motif commande}=='FAS') || ( {Type de facture}=='YFAB' && {Motif commande}=='FAS' ))) ~> FacFilter
FacFilter, source2 join({Récept. de march.} == HubSAPid,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 filter(isNull(HubSAPid)) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['aymeric_extraction_vente_directe.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
